hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select distinct ebLc.EBLC_ADDRESS, ebLc.EBLC_CODE, ebLc.EBLC_NAME_CN, ebLc.EBLC_NAME_EN, ebLc.EBLC_NAME_SHORT, CDWH.CDWH_ADDRESS, CDWH.Cdwh_Code from eb_location ebLc, (select cd.CDWH_ADDRESS, cd.Cdwh_Code from cd_warehouse cd where cd.Cdwh_Code in (:cdwhCodes) << and cd.org_id = :orgId>>) CDWH where (ebLc.EBLC_ADDRESS like CDWH.CDWH_ADDRESS and CDWH.CDWH_ADDRESS is not null) or (CDWH.CDWH_ADDRESS like ebLc.EBLC_ADDRESS and CDWH.CDWH_ADDRESS is not null) << and ebLc.Org_Id = :orgId>>
